generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending from the foreground into the distance, with parked cars and pedestrians on the sides, indicates it is a road.
- sidewalk: The paved areas on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and used by pedestrians, are sidewalks.
- building: The large white building on the left and the gray-yellow building on the right are clearly buildings.
- vegetation: The large tree on the left side of the road and the tree branches visible on the right are vegetation.
- terrain: The grassy area on the left side of the road is terrain.
- sky: The bright, clear area above the buildings and trees indicates the sky.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: A black car is parked on the right side of the road, and other cars are visible further down the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk and road, including one with a traffic sign.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a 'P' and text is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is partially visible on the right side of the road, near the pedestrians.
